alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marinette County through 245 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crivitz, or 25 miles northwest of Marinette, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crivitz around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wausaukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Marinette County; Southern Marinette County
